tuv.seg: • Getting a copy of your credit record
• Cóip de do thaifead creidmheasa a fháil
Banks and other lenders generally send information about borrowers to a central database that is operated by a credit reference agency or credit register
Go ginearálta, seolann bainc agus iasachtóirí eile faisnéis faoi iasachtaithe chuig bunachar sonraí lárnach atá á oibriú ag gníomhaireacht teistiméireachta creidmheasa nó clár creidmheasa
This information includes what credit agreements you have made and your history of repaying them
Áirítear leis an bhfaisnéis seo na comhaontuithe creidmheasa a rinne tú agus do stair maidir le hiad a íoc
It is used to generate a credit rating or credit score, which indicates whether your credit repayment record is good or poor
Úsáidtear iad chun rátáil chreidmheasa nó scór creidmheasa a chruthú, a thugann le fios cibé acu an bhfuil do thaifead aisíocaíochta creidmheasa go maith nó go holc
The database is available for lenders to consult to see if potential borrowers have ever defaulted on loans
Tá fáil ag iasachtóirí ar an mbunachar sonraí chun dul i gcomhairle féachaint ar theip ar iasachtaithe féideartha riamh iasachtaí a íoc
The aim of the system is to help lenders to assess the ability of borrowers to repay any future debts
Is í aidhm an chórais cabhrú le hiasachtóirí rochtain a fháil ar chumas iasachtaithe aon fhiachas amach anseo a aisíoc
Credit Reporting Act 2013
An tAcht um Thuairisciú Creidmheasa 2013
The Credit Reporting Act 2013 came into effect on 27 January 2014
Tháinig an tAcht um Thuairisciú Creidmheasa 2013 i bhfeidhm ar 27 Eanáir 2014
It provides for the establishment and operation of a statutory Central Credit Register (CCR) system
Forálann sé do bhunú agus oibriú córas Clár Lárnach Creidmheasa (CLC) reachtúil
Credit providers will be required to report a comprehensive range of credit information
Ceanglófar ar sholáthróirí creidmheasa chun réimse cuimsitheach d’fhaisnéis chreidmheasa a thuairisciú
They will be obliged to check with the Register for all applications for credit above €2,000 in value
Ina theannta sin, beidh dualgas orthu seiceáil leis an gClár i dtaobh gach iarratais ar chreidmheas os cionn luach €2,000
Consumers will be entitled to get one free copy of their record every 12 months
Beidh tomhaltóirí i dteideal cóip amháin saor in aisce a fháil dá dtaifead gach 12 mhí
Read more about the Act in this press release
Is féidir níos mó a léamh faoin Acht sa phreaseisiúint seo
The Central Credit Register will be established and operated by the Central Bank of Ireland, which has published regulations governing its operation
Cuirfidh Banc Ceannais na hÉireann an Clár Lárnach Creidmheasa ar bun agus oibreoidh an Banc é freisin. Tá rialacháin foilsithe ag an mBanc chun oibriú an Chláir a rialú
It is expected to start producing credit reports after December 2017
Is cosúil go dtosóidh an Clár ar thuairiscí creidmheasa a sholáthar tar éis mí na Nollag 2017
Credit reference agencies collect both negative information and positive information about consumers
Bailíonn gníomhaireachtaí teistiméireachta creidmheasa faisnéis dhiúltach agus dhearfach araon faoi thomhaltóirí
Negative information is information about any default on credit repayments, such as arrears, missed payments and bankruptcies
Is ionann faisnéis dhiúltach agus faisnéis faoi aon teip ar aisíocaíochtaí creidmheasa, ar nós riaráistí, íocaíochtaí caillte agus féimheacht
Positive information is information relating to your overall financial standing, such as your overdraft limit, the limit on your credit card and records of your repayments
Is ionann faisnéis dhearfach agus faisnéis a bhaineann le do staid fhoriomlán airgeadais, ar nós do theorainn rótharraingte, an teorainn ar do chárta creidmheasa agus taifid ar d’aisíocaíochtaí
The main credit reference agency for individuals in Ireland is the Irish Credit Bureau (ICB) but there are several other agencies, mainly dealing with businesses

Is iad an phríomhghníomhaireacht teistiméireachta creidmheasa do dhaoine aonair in Éirinn Biúró Creidmheasa na hÉireann (ICB) ach tá roinnt gníomhaireachtaí eile ann, a dhéileálann go príomha le gnólachtaí
The ICB compiles a private database of information supplied by its members, which are the main financial institutions, including some credit unions
Bailíonn an BCÉ bunachar sonraí príobháideach faisnéise a sholáthraíonn a gcomhaltaí, arb iad na príomhinstitiúidí airgeadais, lena n-áirítear roinnt comhair chreidmheasa
Local authorities are also members
Tá údaráis áitiúla ina gcomhaltaí chomh maith
Membership does not include utility companies or retail outlets
Ní féidir le cuideachtaí fóntais nó asraonta miondíola bheith ina gcomhaltaí
The database includes information on a wide range of loans, including personal loans, mortgages and credit card loans
Áirítear leis an mbunachar sonraí faisnéis ar réimse fairsing iasachtaí, lena n-áirítear iasachtaí pearsanta, morgáistí agus iasachtaí cárta creidmheasa
That information is available only to members of the ICB (and, of course, to yourself)
Níl an fhaisnéis ar fáil ach do chomhaltaí an BCÉ (agus, dar ndóigh, duit féin)
The ICB does not decide whether or not you get a loan
Ní dhéanann an BCÉ cinneadh ar cibé acu an dtabharfar nó nach dtabharfar iasacht duit
Financial institutions use the information held by the ICB when deciding whether or not to lend to you
Úsáideann institiúidí airgeadais an fhaisnéis atá á coimeád ag an BCÉ nuair a bhíonn cinneadh á dhéanamh faoi cibé acu iasacht a thabhairt duit nó a mhalairt
International credit rating agencies (for example, Moody’s, Fitch’s, Standard and Poor’s) generally assess business debts and have little relevance to consumers
Is gnách go ndéanann gníomhaireachtaí idirnáisiúnta rátála creidmheasa (mar shampla, Moody’s, Fitch’s, Standard agus Poor’s) measúnú ar fhiachas gnó agus is beag a bhaineann siad le tomhaltóirí
The Irish Credit Bureau’s database will only hold information about you if you have had an active loan in the past 5 years and if your lender has provided information to the ICB
Ní choimeádfaidh bunachar sonraí Bhiúró Creidmheasa na hÉireann faisnéis fút ach má bhí iasacht ghníomhach agat le 5 bliana anuas agus má sholáthair d’iasachtóir faisnéis don BCÉ
The information is held in an individual credit report
Coimeádtar an fhaisnéis i dtuairisc aonair chreidmheasa
• Your name, date of birth, address(es) used by you in relation to financial transactions
• D’ainm, dáta breithe, seoladh/seoltaí a d’úsáid tú maidir le hidirbhearta airgeadais
• Names of lenders and account numbers of loans that you currently hold, or that were active within the last 5 years
• Ainmneacha iasachtóirí agus uimhreacha cuntais iasachtaí atá agat faoi láthair, nó a bhí gníomhach le 5 bliana anuas
• Repayments made or missed for each month on each loan
• Aisíocaíochtaí a rinneadh nó a cailleadh in aghaidh na míosa ar gach iasacht
• Failure to clear off any loan
• Aon teip ar aon iasacht a ghlanadh
• Loans that were settled for less than you owed and
• Iasachtaí a réitíodh ar mhéid níos lú ná a bhí le híoc agat, agus
• Legal actions that your lender took against you
• Caingne dlí a ghlac d’iasachtóir i do leith
The system records when a lender has consulted it, so you can find out if this happened in your case
Cuireann an córas i dtaifead nuair a chuaigh tú i gcomhairle leis, ionas gur féidir leat a dheimhniú má tharla seo i do chás
Every financial institution that is a member of the ICB is required to provide you with details of any credit reference agency it has used when assessing your application for a loan

Ceanglaítear ar gach institiúid airgeadais atá mar chomhalta an BCÉ chun sonraí faoi aon ghníomhaireacht teistiméireachta creidmheasa a sholáthar duit a úsáideadh agus measúnú á dhéanamh ar d’iarratas ar iasacht
Credit agencies may publish lists of judgments registered in the Central Office of the High Court (for example, such lists are published in Stubbs Gazette and some newspapers)
Féadfaidh gníomhaireachtaí creidmheasa liostaí breithiúnas a fhoilsiú a cláraíodh i Lár-Oifig na hArd-Chúirte (mar shampla, foilsítear na liostaí siúd in Stubbs Gazette agus i roinnt nuachtán)
This is public information
Is ionann seo agus faisnéis phoiblí
You have no control over its publication or the use that is made of it
Níl aon smacht agat ar a fhoilsiú ná ar an úsáid a bhaintear as
Summary of your credit status
Achoimre ar do stádas creidmheasa
Credit scoring is a technique which summarises your credit status at a particular point in time
Teicníc atá i scóráil creidmheasa a dhéanann achoimriú ar do stádas creidmheasa ag pointe áirithe ama
The ICB will calculate a Credit Bureau Score (CBS) based on your credit report if a lender requests it (only if the lender is an ICB member)
Ríomhfaidh an BCÉ Scór Biúró Creidmheasa (SBC) bunaithe ar do thuairisc chreidmheasa má iarrann iasachtóir air (ach amháin más comhalta BCÉ an t-iasachtóir)
If you have a good record of repaying loans, then you get a high score
Má tá dea-thaifead agat maidir le hiasachtaí a aisíoc, tugtar ardscór duit
You get a low score if your repayment record is poor
Tugtar ísealscór duit má tá drochthaifead aisíocaíochta agat
The only way to improve your credit score is to improve your repayment record
Is é an t-aon bhealach chun feabhas a chur ar do scór creidmheasa do thaifead aisíocaíochta a fheabhsú
Your consent is required for the provision of information about your credit history to the Irish Credit Bureau
Tá do thoiliú ag teastáil chun faisnéis faoi do stair chreidmheasa a thabhairt do Bhiúró Creidmheasa na hÉireann
However, it is sometimes the practice that such consent is an integral part of your credit agreement, so you may not notice that you have given consent
Mar sin féin, tarlaíonn sé, corruair, go mbíonn an toiliú sin mar chuid lárnach do de chomhaontú creidmheasa, mar sin, tharlódh nár thug tú faoi deara gur thug tú toiliú
You have the usual rights under data protection legislation (pdf) to access the records held about you by credit agencies and to have incorrect information rectified
Tá na gnáthchearta agat faoin reachtaíocht um chosaint sonraí (pdf) chun rochtain a fháil ar na taifid atá á gcoimeád ag gníomhaireachtaí creidmheasa fút agus go gceartaítear aon fhaisnéis mhícheart
You may ask the agency to provide you with a copy of the personal information it holds about you
Is féidir leat iarraidh ar an ngníomhaireacht cóip den fhaisnéis phearsanta atá á coimeád acu fút a thabhairt duit
If this is inaccurate, you may ask the agency to correct it
Má tá sí míchruinn, féadfaidh tú iarraidh ar an ngíomhaireacht í a cheartú
If you are not satisfied with how the agency deals with you, you may appeal to the Data Protection Commissioner
Mura bhfuil tú sásta leis an mbealach a chaitheann an ghníomhaireacht leat, is féidir leat achomharc a dhéanamh leis an gCoimisinéir Cosanta Sonraí
Requirement to consult information on databases
Ceanglas chun dul i gcomhairle faisnéise ar bhunachair shonraí

The European Communities (Consumer Credit Agreements) Regulations 2010 (SI 281/2010) provide that creditors, before agreeing to give you a loan, are obliged to assess your creditworthiness based on sufficient information obtained from you and, where necessary, from a database of such information

Forálann Rialacháin na gComhphobal Eorpach (Comhaontuithe maidir le Creidmheas do Thomhaltóra), 2010 (IR 281/2010) go gceanglaítear ar chreidiúnaithe, sula gcomhaontaíonn siad chun iasacht a thabhairt duit, measúnú a dhéanamh ar d'acmhainneacht chreidmheasa, bunaithe ar fhaisnéis leordhóthanach a fuarthas uait agus, sa chás gur cuí, ó bhunachar sonraí den fhaisnéis sin
They also provide that, if you are refused credit because of the information found on the database, the creditor must immediately tell you this and give you particulars of the database used

Forálann siad chomh maith, má dhiúltaítear creidmheas a thabhairt duit mar gheall ar an bhfaisnéis a fuarthas ar bhunachar sonraí, ní mór don chreidiúnaí é seo a insint duit láithreach agus sonraí maidir leis an mbunachar sonraí a úsáideadh a thabhairt duit
This legislation applies to personal consumer credit agreements for amounts between €200 and €75,000 and it does not apply to mortgages
Baineann an reachtaíocht seo le comhaontuithe pearsanta creidmheasa do thomhaltóirí ar shuimeanna idir €200 agus €75,000 agus ní bhaineann sé le morgáistí
At present, there is no regulation of such agencies
Faoi láthair, níl na gníomhaireachtaí seo á rialú
There is an EU proposal to regulate credit rating agencies
Ach is ann do thogra AE chun gníomhaireachtaí rátála creidmheasa a rialú
Getting a copy of your credit record
Cóip de do thaifead creidmheasa a fháil
You can get a copy of your credit record by applying online to the Irish Credit Bureau and paying €6
Féadfaidh tú cóip de do thaifead creidmheasa a fháil trí iarratas a dhéanamh ar líne le Biúró Creidmheasa na hÉireann agus trí €6 a íoc
For security reasons, it will be posted out to you
Ar mhaithe le húdair shlándála, déanfar é a sheoladh sa phost chugat
It will not be emailed
Ní dhéanfar é a sheoladh chugat ar ríomhphost
Alternatively, you can download a Personal Enquiry Form (pdf) or request an application form
Mar mhalairt air sin, féadfaidh tú Foirm Fiosrúcháin Phearsanta (pdf) a íoslódáil nó iarraidh ar fhoirm iarratais
Send the completed application form with payment of €6 to the address below
Seol an fhoirm chomhlánaithe iarratais le híocaíocht €6 chuig an seoladh thíos
Only 1 search can be conducted per application, and the ICB takes about 3 or 4 days to process each one
Ní féidir ach cuardach amháin a dhéanamh in aghaidh an iarratais, agus glacann sé thart ar 3 nó 4 lá ar an BCÉ chun gach ceann a phróiseáil
The report that the ICB issues will display a unique reference number
Taispeánfaidh an tuairisc a eisíonn an BCÉ uimhir uathúil thagartha
You may then contact the ICB to discuss your report, quoting this unique number
Is féidir leat teagmháil a dhéanamh leis an BCÉ, ansin, chun do thuairisc a phlé, agus an uimhir uathúil seo a lua
You cannot discuss your credit record with the ICB by phone until you have received the report
Ní féidir leat do thaifead creidmheasa a phlé leis an BCÉ ar an nguthán go dtí go bhfuil an tuairisc faighte agat
If you wish to have inaccurate information on your credit record amended, contact the lender concerned and ask them to forward the correct information to the ICB
Más mian leat go leasófar faisnéis mhíchruinn atá ar do thaifead creidmheasa, déan teagmháil le d'iasachtóir agus iarr orthu an t-eolas cruinn a sheoladh chuig BCÉ
The ICB cannot change the information unless asked to do so by the relevant lender
Ní féidir le BCÉ an taifead a athrú ach amháin tar éis dóibh iarratas a fháil ó iasachtóir
The ICB has published further information about credit ratings
D’fhoilsigh an BCÉ tuilleadh faisnéise faoi rátálacha creidmheasa
